attributes.action: Petition to keep the 70centimeter amatuer radio band
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government and OFCOM are clearly trying to slowly wedge away 70cms from us amateurs as secondary users. Please do not let this happen, don't be a fool, sign this petition now. 70cms is a great band, please dont take it off us. They have already started taking it off us, We can start calmping down on it now. SIGN THIS PETITION

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Petition to keep the 70centimeter amatuer radio band."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16474


Prime Minister's Office
